ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'I am indeed a clear warner.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And say: "I am a distinct warner,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and clearly tell the unbelievers: "I am most certainly a plain warner,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "Indeed, I am simply one who warns."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And proclaim, “Indeed I, yes I, am the clear Herald of Warning.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And say (O Muhammad): "I am indeed a plain warner."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And say: Surely I am the plain warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and say, 'Surely, I am the manifest warner.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And say: Lo! I, even I, am a plain warner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and say, "I am, indeed, a plain warner,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And say thou: verily I! I am a plain warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and say, ‘I am indeed a manifest warner [of punishment from God],’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And say: "I am indeed he that warneth openly and without ambiguity,"-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And say: "I am indeed a plain warner."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And say: 'I am the plain warner'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And say, “I am the clear warner.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner" -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:89] And say: ‘Indeed, I am the warner, of God’s chastisement, lest it be sent down on you, the clear [warner], clear in [his] warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And say: Lo! I, even I, am a plain warner) I am a messenger warning you against Allah's chastisement, in a language that you all understand,
